description.value:
Your thick fur protects you from certain environmental hazards and makes you resistant to some types of @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poisons}.

Prerequisites: Skittermander or ysoki.

Benefit: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves against cold and heat dangers. In addition, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves made to avoid contracting contact @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.gBhZDjh30JEyh7DY]{Diseases} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poisons}.

Special: At the GMâ€™s discretion, other furred races might meet the prerequisites for this feat.

modifiers.name: Protective Fur (cold and heat)
modifiers.notes: Circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves against cold and heat dangers.

modifiers.name: Protective Fur (contact diseases and poisons)
modifiers.notes: You gain a circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves made to avoid contact diseases and poisons.
